content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on our balcony at the time, i saw something in the sky... thought at first it was a red balloon.  watched it move around and change directions several times, although it continually made its way from south to north.  we got the binoculars out and the camera.  could never see it that clearly, just that it seemed strange.  once i was able to look at the pictures i took and zoom in on them, i was amazed at what i saw.  may be something from the military, but nothing like anything i've seen before.  triangle shape with what looks like 3 big booster engines in the back.  watched it until it was too far away to see.
i don't wish to attach the photos here.
content.summary: Saw object flying through sky from south to north

content.detailedDescription: Was talking to a friend on the telephone & walked out in the back yard.  i always like to take a look to see if i can see the moon before turning in.  finished call & saw the moon as big as its ever been but saw a lot more.  a large bright white light in the southern sky - a light far brighter and bigger than any of the stars.  it wasn't moving.  called a friend and drove to the butler university campus where they have an observatory.  all was quiet on campus & observatory appeared to be locked up tight.  object in sky could be seen even better through my binoculars.  it was sitting in the same spot & never moved. went back home & checked it every couple minutes for an hour until the mosquitoes got too bad & called it a night.  friend in hamilton county who lives in country setting could see it far better without city lights.  she said she had seen it last night also.
content.summary: Huge bright white shape in southern sky

content.detailedDescription: I took my dogs out for the last time of the night.  as i looked up at the sky to see what stars were visible, something i do every night, i noticed movement out of the clouds (which were wispy and numerous since we had an all day rain) slightly to the left of where i was looking.  i never saw an object or any light source, but something moved out of the clouds at a high speed and made the clouds trail behind it, like a con trail.  in fact, i saw the cloud trail forming behind the "object", but never saw the object.  normally, this could easily be explained by a plane or something mundane and i simply didn't have a view of the lights; however, this "object" made a right turn as it moved between the clouds.  what's odd (and why i'm reporting this) was that the speed and angle it turned at.  since the object moved through the clouds, i have an idea on the height it was at.  not only was the object moving 4-5 times (at least) faster than a normal airplane, it made a 80 degree, sharp turn.  the whole thing took less than 3 seconds and was completely silent.  there were other breaks in the clouds, so i kept looking to see if the "object" continued its movement, but could no longer see it anywhere.  it was as if it vanished.  don't know what it was, but it was pretty darn cool to see.  i would compare the speed the object was travelling at to a fighter jet going full throttle, but that's a guess.  based on the height of the object and the trail it left behind it, i would guess it was the size of a car (but this is also a guess).
content.summary: Invisible object seen travelling through clouds, leaving cloud trail behind it.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on the shores of lake huron with my family.  we were watching the camp fire.  we all saw it at the same time.  i said " oh my god, what is that!"  there was a large orange light or fire ball just over the lake.  it split into two then leap froged across the night sky.  it was around 10:30pm or so.  after about 5 min or so it vanished.  it reappered twice that night, but only for a few seconds.  after the first sighting we saw many, thousands of small sparkles across the sky.  not stars.  they were much smaller.  they disappated after a few minutes.  while the small sparkles were showing, at least 2 planes flew into the area. they appeared to be fighter jets. there was at least 1 helicopter as well.  a lot of unusual air traffic for sure.The jets circled the area for about an hour.  this is very unusual for this area , for this time of night,mid week.  the orange light apperaed the next night at the same time.  it did not leap frog across the sky, but did split into two.  it vanished after a few minutes.  it did not reappear.
content.summary: A bright orange circle appeared. it seperated into two, then leap froged across the night sky for a few seconds. it then reappeared and split into two again.

content.detailedDescription:
Sorry but i don't know english very well...I speak spanish

i was sleeping when my mum woke me up at 5:30 am. she said me look! what it's that?? (and she opens the window because i live in a appartment), so i saw to the dark sky and i see a point or something like a star but it was alone, the sky hadn't any other star, well i still looking that and waited also i took some photos with my movil , i saw like little paws appear around from the star or whatever that it was, i don't know what that thing could be but it didn't move it stays in the same place all the time until the sun appears and sunrise, i couldn't see it after.
content.summary: That thing looked like a star, but it stills static

content.detailedDescription:
Sorry but i don't know english very well...I speak spanish

i was sleeping when my mum woke me up at 5:30 am. she said me look! what it's that?? (and she opens the window because i live in a appartment), so i saw to the dark sky and i see a point or something like a star but it was alone, the sky hadn't any other star, well i still looking that and waited also i took some photos with my movil , i saw like little paws appear around from the star or whatever that it was, i don't know what that thing could be but it didn't move it stays in the same place all the time until the sun appears and sunrise, i couldn't see it after.
content.summary: That thing looked like a star, but it stills static

content.detailedDescription: Driving home, wife taking pics of sunset... caught this on camera.. no clue but seen other ufo sightings that didn't look as good..
content.summary: Taking pics of the sunset, caught something on camera

content.detailedDescription: Same object, same location as my last report.
content.summary: It is in the south, about 30-35 degrees above the horizon, hovering now.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking in our local entertainment district in irvine, ca. with a friend, we were there eating/shopping. we were headed towards the merry-go-round which was brightly lit up and i looked up because the moon caught my attention and i immediately saw the two objects. i told my friend to look up at them as well. they were probably at the height of a plane, we were near an airport, and they were distinct circles. the one on the left was white and seemed stationery and the one on the right was red. the red one kept moving like a back and forth motion towards the white one. it was cool to watch because i knew what it was. then my friend and i wanted to back away from the bright merry-go-round to look at it w/out the brightness around us. so, we turned our heads for a moment to watch our step to back up and when we looked again they were gone. at first i thought it went in to clouds or something but there wasn't any. you could see the moon perfectly.
it was my first ufo siting! i have been waiting for years to see one and finally did. awesome! as i drove home shortly after that i kept looking to the sky to see if they would reappear but no luck and i couldn't keep looking to the left as i was driving. i was so excited and wondered if they knew that we saw them.
my other friend told me a while ago that she too saw a ufo(actual craft) above a super market parking lot in irvine also. but it was there for her not just in general. it paralyzed her momentarily and she couldn't walk to her car. it freaked her out!
content.summary: 2 circular lights, one white, one red, separate because the red one moved towards the white back and forth.

content.detailedDescription:
Was on the deck having a beer with my wife and sister-in-laws.  we get a lot of airplane traffic and we like to identify planes.  my wife pointed out the object and directed my attention to it.  i looked to the south and east and saw a black object in the sky.  part of the object moved and hung low like an 's' shape. i was like what the heck is that?! what is that. i noted the time on my watch at 6:15 pm cst. the unusual shape peaked our interest and we grabbed the binoculars.  it looked like a big black hanger drifting and floating.  it would erratically change shape from a hanger like boomerang to a triangle and then back to a boomerang.  it would undulate and become disc-shaped and then elongate into a cylinder with a big sphere on the end. we saw a southwest airline plane take off past it. the object would have been visible on their left side.  it drifted higher and farther away while continuing to change shape.  it went out of our line of sight and i went around to the front of the house with the binoculars it continued to drift and change shape. it was positioned about ten o'clock high and i gave it's location to my sister-in-law's fiance' over the cell phone and he saw it change shapes too.  
based on it's drifting movement i think it could have been some sort of cylindrical balloon. i could see light through it as if it was segmented when it was 's' shaped. it floated off past the line of trees and out of my line of sight.
content.summary: Saw black object cylinder shape changed to boomerang, triangle, s, disc, and sphere.

content.detailedDescription: Ok well here it is! i had just recently came back to my school from an away basketball game. it was around 8 pm and me and a group of friends were walking to the varsity game at the gym when all of a sudden my friend is like holy sh*t! and we looked up we saw it.. it was a giant disc with a light that traveled across it and came back around( i can draw it better to describe it) and a red blinking dot at the bottm. it wasnt making any noise or anything it was hovering about 100 ft in the air! yeah that low! and was traveleing at a estimated rate of 5mph!I wasnt seeing stuff because all my friends saw it! and i called my friend and he told me he was at a stater bros like around a mile away and he said he saw the same exact thing. but i never heard anything on the news that night like really i dont know how people didnt see it! it was so low and was going really really slow. like it was literally the most amazing thing i have ever seen like i mean why would it be flying so low? and why so slow? i awlays ask myself this and the explanation i can think of is... our government!!! well im going to the convention this month in costa mesa where it happened! i really just want to hear more people come out and say what they saw because i was astonished and im scared for life im never gonna forget it! if you can get back at me at caicedo_fernando@yahoo.Com and i will respond!
content.summary: It had a light that traveled acrossed it with red dont blinking at the bottom

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on the patio of the best western hotel inn of sedona just sitting and drinking coffee. my wife for whatever reason looked over her shoulder and saw an object in the sky behaving strangely. when we first saw it we did not know what it was (we still dont). it was not a plane, helicopter, star, or planet. it was moving and changing its shape and colour in all directions, including moving towards us and away from us. we also saw another object which was always south east of the main object, further away and had more colours on it. i got my camcorder and filmed non-stop for about an hour, and was concentrating so much at the time on filming, that it was only this year when i got round to downloading the dvd and watching it i realised the significance of what i had. the following night i again used the dvd, but this time the main object was not there, but the other smaller one was, it was also in the same position. on the first night we did not lose sight of the objects, but after holding the camcorder for an hour or so in the same angled upright position i could no longer continue to film them. i enclose a sketch of the event, and two photos taken from the dvd.
content.shape: Boomerang,  Bullet,  Missile,  Cigar,  Circle,  Cylinder,  Disc,  Sphere
content.summary: Two ufo's over sedona, arizona. one fairly still the other very active.

content.detailedDescription: Red arrows display over our town today and it seems we were not the only ones enjoying there mental flying skills. three different types of unknown craft are in pics on my phone camera and two in my friends two of them ive seen befor in photos ive taken weeks apart. one looks like a giant sort of dragonfly at distance would be to big to fly if insectoid this is in previous pic on july 25th.Two looks fuzzy very far off but plain to make out through arrows formation previously seen 5th august in pic more stuby fighter craft look from bs galactica not one of ours. three is new seems very far away in pic also and is night stick shaped similar to craft in sts88 stills if there not fake.Friends cam picked up the other two first is bullit shaped with tail fin. silver and gold in colour and is passing through a formation or just in front not visible at the time but clear in the photo if they saw it they would have to take avoiding action.The last is very far awy high up and maybe triangular or boomerang type.The human eye seems easyly fooled most ufos go unseen until you see the pics things have been seen in the area most of my life here just not all at the same time but i am shure they whoever they are would enjy all types of displays as much as all of us!
content.summary: Unknown spectators at red arrows display

content.detailedDescription:
In 1997 - 98 my wife and i saw a ufo on several occasions just north of i-70, near yukon, pennsylvania. we traveled this country road at night several times a week to visit an older gentleman that i was a guardian for. the objects appeared to be several lights that joined together and separated at various times, when they joined as one unit, it appeared to shed something kind of like a  burning molten liquid. 

we were near the village of yukon and saw these objects to the south of i-70.  we haven't told many people about this, i'm sure you know why! but just having seen tonight's show, i think that they may have been very close to the kecksburg area.  also near the area where we were, there was some sort of hazardous material disposal site, not sure if that has any bearing on this.
content.summary: Mr chromulak witnessed an odd object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Hello, my husband and i were sightseeing along the pacific coast highway on saturday, july 11, 2009.  we noticed some windsurfers and stopped the car on the side of the road and got out to take this picture.  i sensed something.  i have always been interested in ufo's.  we noticed the two disc shaped objects above the windsurfers when we put them on the computer after we got home to dickinson, north dakota.  seeing these two objects just made my day!  i would like to share this picture with anyone interested in ufo's.  thank you!
content.summary: Ufo's observing windsurfers

content.detailedDescription:
concerning the report submitted today sunday aug. 9 titled "discovery of ancient/current ufo landing & dumping site found on google maps" - 
the screenshot map provided with the report is a location at the northern end of the peninsula about 4 miles north of the village of sant' antonio di santadi, it. it is on the central west coast of the island of sardinia.

     it is easily recognizable at a height of 2000 feet on google maps.

     what evidence the submitter supposedly from wisconsin has for their claim is unknown to me.

     i make no claim about the site whatsoever.

     see my blog at  http://alienvisitorevidence.Blogspot.Com
content.summary: Location of  "discovery of ancient/current ufo landing & dumping site found on google maps"

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9:30pm i was sitting on my rear patio facing east when i observed a star-like object, white in color, moving on an east to west trajectory. i cannot give an objective altitude, however i would guess the height at 40,000 ft. the object was south of my position at an angle of 75 degrees from the ground. due to the object's altitude, i would state that speed was well above typical jetliner speeds. object was observed for 10 seconds.

at 9;45pm, while sitting in same position on patio, i heard a distinct and somewhat painful high-pitched sound in my left ear. i looked up to the east and observed a "flash" of light....White in color....And shaped like a missile moving southwest to northeast at extremely high rate of speed. altitude is estimated to be 500 ft. at an angle of 60 degrees from the ground. object moved through field of vision in 1 second. what was strange is the object seemed to leave a translucent ring trail that glowed for several seconds after the rod/missile passed. i would estimate missle to be 100 ft. in length. not a meteor, as missle and ring trail were very distinct in shape. only sound observed was a high-pitched sound and some pain in my left ear. my 3 dogs did not respond to the sound that i heard, so i assume they heard nothing. i must input that back in june i had contact with an object in same location. from that point forward i have experienced a high-pitched humming sound in both ears that has not gone away. this experience raised that volume in left ear to a "painful" level. after rod/missile left area of vision, pain in left ear went away, however high-pitched humming in both ears continues as it has since june observation.
content.summary: 2 sightings

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
> >
> > not sure who this email will find, but i thought i would send an  
> > email out to talk to someone. first a little about myself, my name  
> > is william and i am 28 from new braunfels, born in san antonio,  
> > raised in nb. i have lived all over the country, and at the age of  
> > 17 i joined the marines, after getting out, eventually i came back  
> > home and started a beautiful family here in nb. recently a local  
> > friend of mine here got me back into ufo's, as he told me of a  
> > incident that occurred with him late last year in wisconsin while he  
> > was up there for the winter. as a youth here in nb i lived with my  
> > brother and mother. just us three, and about every 18 months we  
> > would move locally here in nb. and while the incident i'm about to  
> > relay happened years ago it was and still is very vivid in my mind,  
> > especially since i actually own my home not 4 miles from where my  
> > incident occurred. in late july 1991, i was 10 years old, my little  
> > brother was 7 and my mother was 31. at dusk one evening i was out  
> > mowing the front yard, and at the time there was only 1 other home  
> > in the vicinity. near the front corner of the yard, i looked up and  
> > about 300 yards away, and about 75 or so feet up above a livestock  
> > pond was a massive triangular shaped ufo. it had three red lights at  
> > each corner and what appeared to be a fourth light, going from what  
> > looked like the dead center to almost trailing it. i ran inside got  
> > my mother and brother and we stood there watching it move in circles  
> > around the perimeter of the pond, making no sound whatsoever and at  
> > times it seemed like you could almost make out the actual detail of  
> > the craft and what appeared to be some sort of running or cabin  
> > lights from time to time. as we stood there, we decided to get in  
> > the car and hop on the road that ran parallel with our home, and the  
> > craft was responsive to our driving, it started moving alongside us  
> > about 300 or so yards away parallel with us in the car, and this  
> > happened for roughly 5-7 minutes as it turned south towards san  
> > antonio and instantly disappeared.
> >
> > now i always have remembered this as did my brother and mother. and  
> > while i have told a select few i figured there was no real point in  
> > filing a report because it did happen 18 years ago. but recently as  
> > my friend has moved me to get more involved and active in what  
> > happened, i began to do some research, and up until this point i  
> > knew next to nothing about actual sightings and haven't been a big  
> > follower in the movement. but only recently did i realize that at  
> > the same point in time there was the same crafts appearing in larger  
> > numbers as you may well know in belgium, and as i have read their  
> > stories from those incidents i too have realized that it appears it  
> > was the same or very similar style crafts.
> >
> > well about 10 or so days ago, at the urging of my friend, we decided  
> > to go up to that pond so close to my home, and now there is about 5  
> > or 6 newer homes on that cul-de-sac, but we parked at the end of the  
> > cul-de-sac and went up the little hill to where the pond is, and it  
> > is now drained,what looks to be for about a year or so, but then we  
> > noticed something in the pattern of the grass in what was the bottom  
> > of the pond, and in the middle in 3 semi distinct lines, sort of  
> > forming a triangle there is absolutely nothing or very little  
> > growing, now i'm pretty level headed, and realize its been nearly 2  
> > decades, but my friend and i did find that to be unusual. we are  
> > skeptical it has anything to do with what i've seen years ago but  
> > nonetheless it was interesting, but probably nothing.
> >
> > i will close, as i stated in the beginning i am not sure if this has  
> > any bearing on what goes on know, but at least i thought i would  
> > share my story with an organization with the reputation and clout  
> > ya'll have, so thank you very much,
> >
> >
> > william locke
> >

I was waiting in beckington park to be picked up by a friend it was 10.43 pm ish. 
i just finished a cigerette. it was a clear sky and full moon.

i looked up because it was a fluke and i noticed it was a bright night, just then i caught sight of a bright orange in colour fire like disc thing floating left in the sky i saw it was it came into view from behind the villiage hall roof.

i could not tell how far away from me, but they looked like they were above the next field.

i thought it was maybe a plane or something, but it was all fire like orange and in a kind of disc shape, hard to tell as it had like a glow round it. it was silent..Then i thought i had seen a shooting star.
 
it was flying north from me over that feild.

all of a sudden i saw another identical thing flying in the same path as the other and flew in an almost straight line..It met up with the first..Which was now stationary. then as i was trying to figure out what they were i saw three more, again flying along the same path, but one was higher than the others. they were all the same shape size and colour, and appearing from the same direction, they all went at slightly differnt speeds and then they caught up with the first..They were silent no sound at all. 

slowly the first began to fade/disapear i couldnt tell if it was going away or just fading away.

the other four got so close together..Too close...As if they could crash and then began to do the same..Disapear from view. in the same place as the first one was fading.

they all disappeared...

i thought that was the end of it..But no... three more came from the same direction again heading left to the same area as the others..They were flying at differnt heights, one was higher, and one was slower and further behind. they again did the same they began to disapear...There were just those three now at this point..Then just as the first ones they too faded away..

im not one for beliving in ufos but that has to be the strangest thing i have ever seen in my life.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 7 or more ufos

content.detailedDescription:
Leaving a restaurant in andes, new york with family. looked up and saw a bright orange light, much brighter than a star or planet. moving north/northeast at a steady pace. two identical lights followed same path in n sequence.

each light was not a point source. they looked wider at the bottom than at the top, almost like three points of light very close together in a pyramid formation. they did not blink like a plane and were only orange/yellow color.

they were moving at a pace consistent with a conventional craft and kept a steady speed. as the first one seemed to go behind a cloud, a second identical object was seen coming along at the same rate from the same direction, in the same trajectory. 

what was unusual was the color and non-blinking nature of the lights, and the caravan like procession of the three. 

could have been military from stewart air base, 80 miles southeast, but it was something i had never seen before. 

at one point i may have heard jet engine sound, but this was hard to discern.
content.summary: Series of three orange lights moving north/northeast steady speed.

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1995 on a clear sunny day we were coming back from a day of shopping we were heading towards the free way when i saw a flying saucer from the back seat window of are car it was in the sky next to the twin falls perrine bridge it took 3 loops around the blue lakes mall before taking off into the horizon it was truly memorable child hood experience i was 10 years old when this happened and i will never forget it
content.summary: Large disc hovering over perrine bridge twin falls summer of 1995

content.detailedDescription: I was out on glacier point in yosemite, actually i can't remember the exact date.  i believe it was a monday or teusday.  we had gone up to show how beautiful it was to my son's fiance.  we were actually laying down on the rocks right near the point.  there were a thousand stars out the sky was so clear but i am sure i would have never seen it.  my son has always been an "eagle eye"  he said look at those three jets flying in a perfect v.  i knew immediately what it must be.  i stood up and looked.  i said.  those are not jets that's a ufo and it is what people have been seeing all over the world.  we were so awestruck.  i was impressed with the beautiful blue color.  it remeinded me of phosphoresence i had onc seen in the ocean.  there was a jet tailing it very closely.  then i thought maybe the jet was projecting an image, and i said that.  my son said no it's blocking out the stars behind it.  i am pretty familiar with yosemite and i calculate it was 60 miles away and flying the same height 40.000 feet that jets travel.  it took just a few minutes to go from the left side (this would be as far  left of half dome till your vision is blocked by the moutain) and then we watched it till it went out of site to the far right.  my son said it looked like it was several footbal fields in size.  it was certainly much much bigger than the jet.  we just didn't say much, we were so stunned.  none of us had ever seen anything like this before.  i have always believed people that say they saw something but my son is a complete skeptic and was not a believer at all.  i think he would rather forget he saw anything.  there was another family up there at the same time.  we didnt' talk to them and when we left the point it was a little scarey walking back as there really are bears and mountain lions up there and i was just hoping nothing strange would happen.
content.summary: Just like ones now on examiner site - triangle beautiful blue circles

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting in the back yard relaxing and observing the skies when we both observed what appeared to be a reddish colored starlike object that was moving very erradically. it would move from the left to the right, then up and down, then would occasionally appear to be moving in a circular motion. at times it would appear to stop moving and then after a few seconds it would begin moving again. we observed this for about an hour before we decided to come inside.  

while we were watching this starlike object we tried to come up with an explanation of what it could be.  we are familiar with satellites traveling over our house and well as planes. we concluded that it could not possibly be either ones of these as it was not moving like a plane or satellite. we obeserved other stars in the sky but they were stationary and this one starlike object was the only thing that appeared to be moving.
content.summary: Reddish color starlike object moving from left to right and in circles

content.detailedDescription:
We are located 30 miles east of san diego, along interstate 8. we observed a red light in the sky that appeared to have other smaller red lights below or around it. the red light was as large as one of the planets and was due south of us. it also appeared to be higher in the sky than the flight path normally taken by planes flying to our local airports.

as the two of us watched it over a period of time of about 15 minutes, we observed three things in particular.

first, the light would slowly get brighter, then dim, then get brighter, then dim. at the brightest, it was red but as bright as venus. at the faintest, it was still as bright as most stars.

secondly, it appeared to be motionless for at least five minutes, if not longer as we first watched it. we ruled out flares and fireworks of any kind because it was just there, not moving, just changing its brightness.

third, we realized that it was finally moving and appeared to be actually drifting up and to our left in an approximately 45 degree angle eastward. this took an estimated ten minutes.

it then disappeared before it reached where the moon was but the moons light was not the reason it disappearedit just finally faded out completely.
content.summary: Red light east of san diego and west of alpine looking south from interstate 8

content.detailedDescription:
A red light that appeared to be a tail light from a plane taking off from williams gateway airport, formerly williams afb flew over my laft shoulder as i was walking my dog from west to east. i didnt pay much attention at first, but thought it was odd that the light wasn't flashing. i kept on walking looking from time to time as it went over me to the towards tucson. as it got further away i started thing that something didn't seem right. it was still bright red and now appeared to have stopped moving, it just stayed in one fixed position for about 10 minutes. as i turned to make my way home, i kept on looking back to see if was still there, as i reached my house, i put the dog inside and called for my wife. she came out as did my father, we stood and watch it for 10-15 more minutes it did start moving again only this time it headed north at a very slow rate of speed, i came in the house to call mufon but couldn't and but the time i got back outside it had started head east again and then shortly there after faded out as the light got smaller.

any ideas as to what this may have been?
any other reports?
content.summary: Red light traveling very slow from west to east then south to north

content.detailedDescription: Observed disc above neighboorhood approximately a half mile away, craft was blacked out noticeable due to city lights and bright night sky. craft traveled from a north to northeast direction, while making a circular turn, then dissapearing in the northeast sky as it slowly gained altitude. prior to this the disc shaped object traveled the distance of approximately 15 miles horizantally before slowly rising out of sight. incredible, well formed disc shape, very easily seen, no question of shape or form. incredible experience documented by myself and friend.
content.summary: Standing outside speaking with friend saw small blacked out disc against night sky preceeding from west to northeast approximately 200-300 feet above ground

content.detailedDescription:
On april 16 the at approx 9:45--10:00 pm (thur) my wife and i observed this even from the beachside access at 190 th ave ,indian shores florida.
we are fulltime longtime residence .

i am so sure of the date and hour due to this being the day after my daughters 6th birthday and a rare "date night" w/o our child while she visited grandma for her b-day.

ater dinner we went beachside and commenting from our beach chairs on how we missed our long overdue beach walks in our newlywed days etc.

as we looked northward i gasped "what the heck is that". from the east traveling slowly westward over gulf blv ,over the heads of many direct beachfront condos no more than 12 stories high 5 glowing objects .

they were in no hurry ,maybe 30 mph ,perfectly equidistant from one another ,almost as if "flairs on a string" but definetly not flairs.
 
there luminence resembled a "candle in a paperbag" as one might see beside a sidewalk. evenly illuminated,but muffled like a setting sun . no trouble to watch, bronze like . 

i instictivly ran down the beach toward the objects to attempt to get under them, where the moonlight would be behind them for clarity.

just as i approched they traved gulfward slowly gaing altitude and then assuming an independent flightpath up and out to sea (gulf). eventually i lost sight as they flew away .

seconds later 3 other trailing objects repeated this same pattern . allowing me this time much more absorbtion time to digest this rarity .

my wife an ex law enforcement office and i a staunch conservative both thought this must be "one of ours". 

we left the beach promply. i told my wife "someone, another balcony beachgazer must have seen this too" . we looked proactivly for anyone that might have seen this. with no luck.

it has dsiturbed me, so i e-mailed a police officer that also writes a newsletter for the town hall directed to residance of this very small commmunity .

he offered no answers which disappointed me .I told my wife "some offical will know just what this is ,watch".

the officer (name available) offered to contact macdill afb our nearest miltary possibility . they responed they had no knowledge of any such event or drill etc . nothing . i now ask you to maybe try to contact others in the area that may also have reported activity . feel free to call me at 727-259-5439 .Thanks
content.summary: Illuminated oval shaped silent perfectly equidistant aircraft/ lite as a "candle in a paperbag" might look. 5 objects ,unhurried,very predicable flight path

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the shore of the thames inlet in new london ct at around 9:30 pm watching the moon. it was a perfectly clear night, no clouds and a full moon. it was either tuesday (8/4/2009) or wednesday. (i play golf on monday and thursday so it had to be either tues or weds) the moon was to the se so i was looking towards the ocean. i noticed a light moving towards me. it was orange. it was not like a plane light, it wasn't a point source. it was bloomed circular like a light in fog except there was no fog. it came directly toward the inlet. when it got over the general dynamics electric boatyard it changed direction and headed ne and moved away until it dwindled and disappeared (i know it changed direction because it appeared to stop when it started to move directly away from me but i am pretty sure it never changed speed). it appeared to be going faster than a prop plane, like a slow jet. it never changed altitude or speed. when it got pretty far away i could guess its altitude to be somewhere between 10 and 20k feet. it wasn't nearly as high as commercial airliners would be but higher than most small planes. it was totally silent, i no engine sound at all. within a couple of minutes of it disappearing in the distance (it was clear enough that i watched it dwindle in size to nothing) another appeared where the first appeared and followed the exact same path, same altitude, same speed and same orange light. it disappeared exactly like the first, they were identical in every respect. at no time did either show any other light source other than the orange glow and i could not see any kind of craft outline. the light also looked exactly the same coming and going. as i was watching the first one someone was walking by and made a comment about how strange it looked. there were probably around 20 people sitting on the wall within a quarter mile of me who must also have seen them. after seeing the second one i stuck around for about 20 minutes to see if any more would show up. none did but a small prop plane flew by at a couple thousand feet. i could hear the engine clearly and saw red, green and white lights, one flashing. i could also see the outline of the plane. the lights were point sources too, nothing like the orange lights.

i am an engineer. i have a few hours flight time and i was in the air force. this was like no plane i ever saw. i am not a true believer and i have never seen anything before that i would classify as a ufo but this was strange enough that i am reporting it.
content.summary: An orange light flew in and off and then another identical on same path

content.detailedDescription: Well me and my son were on our deck looking at stars and he saw flashing multy collored lights and we loked at them and it was a ufo. of course weve seen them before so we still loked at it and then it shined a light down on the ground  and we were facinated but scared so we kept looking at it and it came lower and closer so then we went inside and got our camera when we cam out the ufo was gone.We thought it was a plane.It was  silver and red and white flashing lights
content.summary: The ufo looked circle and was silver had blue white yellow and red light flashing

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were heading home at 10 pm from a friend's. i told my husband to look in the sky to the north - there were 3 orange lights  in the sky. my husband commented that that was a weird color for stars to be. i jokingly said that they were probably ufo's. we pulled into our driveway about 30 seconds later. i told him to look up again, as there were 3 more balls making their way northward behind our house. my heart was pounding in my chest...I had never seen anything so unusual in the night sky before. a car had stopped just down the street from us. when they saw us looking at the balls, they drove up to the end of our driveway and asked if we had seen the orange balls, too. there was no noise associated with them. i took a picture with my cell phone, but it is faint. the balls continued north until they disappeared from view. i called the local police department to see if anyone else had reported seeing anything in the sky, but the dispatcher said no one else had called in.
content.summary: 3 orange balls heading north in the sky, making no noise. followed by 3 more shortly after.
